title: Use uploaded image as brand logo via theme configuration

requirements.summary: Add the uploaded logo image to frontend static assets under public/assets/generated so it is served at runtime.
acceptanceCriteria: The file frontend/public/assets/generated/1000795148-1.jpg exists in the repo.
Loading /assets/generated/1000795148-1.jpg in the browser returns the image (no 404).

file_operations.description: Add the provided image file as a static asset so it is publicly served from /assets/generated/1000795148-1.jpg at runtime.

requirements.summary: Render the uploaded logo image in the header (and all Logo usages) instead of the current placeholder, keeping it responsive and accessible.
acceptanceCriteria: On all pages (Home/Products/About/Contact), the header displays the uploaded image as the logo.
The logo remains clear and properly sized in the header on both mobile and desktop (no overflow or layout break).
The logo image has appropriate English alt text (e.g., "Predicta Healthcare logo").

file_operations.description: Update Logo rendering to display the configured uploaded logo image (instead of the placeholder), ensure responsive sizing (no overflow), and set an explicit English alt text such as "Predicta Healthcare logo".
